attributes.action: I need a petition to STOP Tersa May from entering office at No : 10
attributes.additional_details: I'm of the opinion that the above back ground clearly explains what is being requested by me. Thank you kindly.
attributes.background:
I'm a 70 year old man who as had a local government background.
I like millions of other uk residents i do not want to see Teresa May enter No : 10 as Prime Minister through the rear door.
At present I have a massive backing for me to start a petition.
